ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Featured__c , Featured_End_Date__c <TODAY(), NOT(ISBLANK(Featured_End_Date__c )), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "knowledge__kav" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Knowledge Article is Featured, the featured end date cannot be in the past. Please select a future date or remove the date to save the record.
